name: Space raven quest - Tiny planet
detailed_description:
A bird-like humanoid had to land his spaceship on an unknown planet. There is some information reaffirming that the planet is inhabited and has the resources needed to continue the flight.
An old school quest with pixel hunting like games from studio Lucas Arts.

Features:
1) Hand-drawn 2d graphical design styled like old cartoons from the '90s;
2) A great amount of references to movies and literature;
3) Morbid humor, including religious topics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Athlon64 3000 + @ 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 6800GT or AMD Radeon X1950 Pro (256MB VRAM with Shader Model 3.0 or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The mature content, especially depictions of sexual acts and/or violence.
